Name: Surging Sacred Chalice
Desc: The specialized refinement material for the Sword of Narzissenkreuz.\nConches were often favored materials in ancient Fontainian civilization for making ritual implements, and the sacred unguents within this conch chosen as a sanctified chalice have finally emerged. Symbolically, this chalice is the primordial word, the oils are the honed will, and the holy sword itself is reason, which breaks through all.
